ViewObject.Name: AR_AR_NOVVO
ViewObject.SQLQuery: With AR_List As (Select 'ALL' ITEM_NAME, 'ALL' AR_NO, 1 SN From Dual UNION ALL SELECT SD.ITEM_CD||'-'||IM.ITEM_DESC||'-'||NVL(AR_NO, HEAT_NO) ITEM_NAME, NVL(AR_NO, HEAT_NO) AR_NO, 2 SN FROM LOT_Stock_Dtl SD Join VW_ALL_ITEM_MAS IM On SD.unit_cd = Im.Unit_Cd And SD.ITEM_CD = Im.ITEM_CD WHERE SD.UNIT_CD = :P272_UNIT And SD.ITEM_CD = Decode(Nvl(:P272_ITEM_CD, 'ALL'), 'ALL', SD.ITEM_CD, :P272_ITEM_CD) ANd Substr(SD.ITEM_CD, 1,2) = Decode(Nvl(:P272_ITEM_GROUP, 'ALL'), 'ALL', Substr(SD.ITEM_CD, 1,2) , :P272_ITEM_GROUP) ANd Substr(SD.ITEM_CD, 1,4) = Decode(Nvl(:P272_ITEM_S_GROUP, 'ALL'), 'ALL', Substr(SD.ITEM_CD, 1,4), :P272_ITEM_S_GROUP) ANd SD.LOC_CD = Decode(Nvl(:P272_LOCATION, 'ALL'), 'ALL', SD.LOC_CD, :P272_LOCATION) --AND Trunc(SD.DOC_DT) Between to_date(:P272_FROM_DATE) and to_date(:P272_TO_DATE) AND SD.TRAN_TYPE = 'R') Select AR_NO, ITEM_NAME From AR_List Group by AR_NO, ITEM_NAME, SN Order By SN
